Enclosing class:
JettyLauncher
protected static final class JettyLauncher.WebAppContextWithReload
extends org.mortbay.jetty.webapp.WebAppContext

A WebAppContext tailored to GWT hosted mode. Features hot-reload with a new WebAppClassLoader to pick up disk changes. The default Jetty WebAppContext will create new instances of servlets, but it will not create a brand new ClassLoader . By creating a new ClassLoader each time, we re-read updated classes from disk. Also provides special class filtering to isolate the web app from the GWT hosting environment.
